page.title: 08*** A DAY IN MY LIFE 1 ***
page.content: {8:20}I GOT UP. {8:25}GOT OUT COMPUTER. {8:31}I LOADED A GAME. {8:32}TOILET. {8:33}I GOT DRESSED.{8:45}LOADED GAME 2 {8:47}STARTED GAME.{9:01}I LOST GAME. {9:02}I GOT WASHED.{9:05}I PLAYED AGAIN AND LOST.{9:30}I SWITCHED OFF GAME. {9:31}DRAWER BROKE SO I FIXED IT. {9:40}I HAD BREAKFAST (TEA-BISCUITS). {9:50}FINISHED BREAKFAST.{9:51}TOOK CUP AWAY AND GOT PEN.{9:55}PUT ON SOCKS AND SHOES.{10:01}DUSTED FOR MAM.{10:06 EMPTIED RUBBISH BOWL.{10:07}TOOK WASHING UPSTAIRS.{10:10}WASHED DISHES. {10:20}WENT TO CHAPEL WITH A.WORTHY. {12:30}CAME HOME AND PHONED J. ONION. {12:35}JOHN CAME FOR HIS LIBRARY BOOK. {12:45}DINNER (CHICKEN LEG,MASHED POTATO AND VEG.).{12:55}PHONED SIMON. {12:57}CALLED FOR SIMON TO GO TO SWIMMING BATHS WITH HIM AND D.SHAW. {3:40}CAME HOME FROM SWIMMING BATHS.
